Message.Subject: New Image Version Found for AVD Hostpool Environment - @{body('Parse_Session_Host_VM_and_RG')?['hostPool']}. Please Approve or Reject Creating Automated Schedule for Updating AVD Environment
Software Update Found for AVD Hostpool Environment - Please Approve or Reject the Rip and Replace of the AVD Environment

logAlerts.name: AVD Rip and Replace Failed
logAlerts.description: The AVD Rip & Replace solution successfully added new session host to the specified AVD host pool.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "AVD Rip & Replace failed"

logAlerts.name: AVD Rip and Replace Succeeded
logAlerts.description: The AVD Rip & Replace solution successfully added new session host to the specified AVD host pool.

allOf.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceProvider == "MICROSOFT.AUTOMATION"
| where Category  == "JobStreams"
| where ResultDescription has "AVD Rip & Replace succeeded"
